results.t: What is Rust and why is it so popular?
results.p: Jan 20, 2020 — The short answer is that Rust solves pain points present in many other languages, providing a solid step forward with a limited number of downsides.

results.t: Why Rust is the most admired language among developers
results.p: May 21, 2024 — Rust is a systems programming language that has gained significant popularity among developers thanks to its emphasis on safety, performance, and productivity.

results.t: The Rust programming language absolutely positively sucks
results.p: Rust is a nightmare. It is overly verbose, convoluted, hard to read, slow to compile, and lifetimes really are a cruel joke.
